description: From pro- (“supporting”) +‎ Latin gestāre (“to bear, to carry”) +‎ -one (“a ketone”).

entries.meaning: (biochemistry, steroids, uncountable) A steroid hormone, secreted by the ovaries, whose function is to prepare the uterus for the implantation of a fertilized ovum and to maintain pregnancy.
(biochemistry, steroids, countable) A synthetic version of the compound, used in contraceptive pills and other pharmaceutical products.
